text: The Picture of Dorian Grey () is a 1915 Russian silent drama movie directed by Vsevolod Meyerhold.Кина не будет? Можно ли вернуть утраченные фильмы It stars Varvara Yanova, Vsevolod Meyerhold, and G. Enriton. The movie is an adaptation of Oscar Wilde's novel of the same title. ==Actors== * Varvara Yanova as Dorian Grey * Vsevolod Meyerhold as Lord Henry Wotton * G. Enriton * P. Belova * Doronin == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1915 drama movies
title: The Picture of Dorian Grey (1915 movie)
